source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 72 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Upon entering combat, and every 60 sec, gain either Massive or Miniature for 30 sec.

Miniature
Reduces your size by 20%, and increases your Speed by 1,251 and Haste by 8,382.

Massive
Increases your size by 20%, maximum health by 326,178, and Strength by 8,196.

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

name: Machine Gob's Iron Grin

spells.description:
Equip: Your harmful melee attacks and abilities have a chance to trigger the detonation mechanism, dealing up to 808,921 Fire damage split between nearby enemies.

Blast strength and radius may vary.

description: Advertised with the slogan 'Big bonk goes big boom!'

spells.description: Use: Teleports the caster to Hellscream's Grasp  on Tol Barad. (4 Hr Cooldown)
